Name: The Red Castle
Description: Coffee and Fine Dining in a Colonial BuildingThe Red Castle is over 100 years old. It was built in 1899 and used to belong to shipping company millionaire Yi Lee. In 2000, it was refitted to become a restaurant. The exterior is built with red bricks and arched corridors. This is the building’s unique structure.
Add: 6 2nd Alley, Sanmin Street, Tamsui District, , Tamsui Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Feng Hua Restaurant
Description: With clean and quiet environment, modern and Zen style, the restaurant mainly offers Jiangsu and Zhejiang Cuisine. The famous food are Baked Shallot Chop, Wuxi Chop, Radish Beef and others. You would never want to miss the surprised daily cold meats.
Add: No.209, Sec. 2, Shuangshi Rd., ,  220, Taiwan, Banqiao Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Hong Kong Chen's gruel and noodle.
Description: Standard Hong Kong style gruel, boil with smal fire for more than 4 hours until the rice becomes soft, and more than 10 kinds of tastes You may enjoy every minute as you eat.
Add: No.46, Zhulin Rd., ,  234, Taiwan, Yonghe Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Zhening Jia Garden Restaurant
Description: The owner has over 30 years of experience preparing authentic Zhejiang and Ningbo dishes. His expertise creates delicious dishes that one will always remember.
Add: No.70, Sec. 1, Zhongshan Rd., ,  252, Taiwan, Sanzhi Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C
Opentime: Wed. - Sun.11:00~14:00 17:00~21:00 closed on Mon. and Tue.

Name: Fu Zhou Lin Pepper Bun
Description: Legend has it that Fu Zhou China's "Green onion meat bun" is actually the ancestor of Taiwan's famous pepper bun, and that explains why Taiwan's pepper buns are filled with large quantities of green onions.
Add: Minsheng St. (inside the Food Street), Ruifang Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: China Spice
Description: Serving traditional Jiang-Nan and a perfect mixture with local cuisine using only the freshest product to produce a mix of indulgent authentic favourites as well as exciting Chinese fusion dishes.
Add: 2nd Floor, No. 1 Section, Wenhua 3rd Road, Linkou District, , Linkou Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Weng Meiyu Malt
Description: The molasses melts in your mouth and the sugary malt aroma holds on the palate for a long time, bringing back childhood memories with the candy. The boss of Weng Meiyu uses traditional method to  create  each  and  every  batch.
Add: Number 128 Sinjhuang Road, , New Taipei, Xinzhuang Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Osmanthus Farm
Description: Special Recommendations: Preserved Osmanthus Petals in Ice Sugar, Lotus Root in Preserved Sweet Osmanthus Petals
Add: No.4, Xinxingkeng, , , Shiding Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C
Opentime: The shop is closed on Monday. / Tue. ~ Fri.11:00-18:00 / Weekend 11:00-20:00

Name: Sanzhi Pigs Light Meal Restaurant
Description: Sanzhi Pigs ran from Sanzhi to Shimen, with cute pig bottoms on the counters. You can also find popular freshly baked cheesecake and toast here.
Add: No.58-8, Kanzijiao, ,  253, Taiwan, Shimen Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Jiuliaopo Ranch green tea rice
Description: To taste this dish, you need to add green tea seed oil into freshly made rice and blend well. The taste has a tea fragrance and it is not greasy.
Add: No.226, Sec. 1, Dingping Rd., Shihding Dist.,  22342, Taiwan , Shiding Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Flower fairy cafe'
Description: A large painting by Van Gogh hung on the wall will come into your eyes as soon as you enter the cafe decorated with European style. The dishes offered are a combination of Taiwan ans European styles. It is a good place for relaxation.
Add: No.53, Guanhai Bivd., Bali Dist  249, Taiwan, Bali Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Jinshan Duck Meat
Description: The owner insists on using mature ducks farmed for 130 days and demands the preservation of its original flavor in the process of cooking. The ducks sold here are all freshly killed and sold. The delicious duck meat is impressive and memorable.
Add: No. 104, jinbauli St., ,  208, Taiwan, Jinshan Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Baoyun Taro Balls shop
Description: Recommended ProductsTofu pudding with taro balls, herbal jelly pudding with taro balls, fresh milk with tofu pudding, tian bu laBaoyun is the name of a 97-year-old grandma who still possesses the beautiful traits of a traditional Taiwanese woman.
Add: No.8, Rueifang St., Rueifang Dist.,  22441, Taiwan, Ruifang Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Feng Wei Pork thick soup
Description: Towards the end of the 1960's, Ruifang and the nearby Houtong area were prosperous mining towns. The 1st-generation boss of "Feng Wei Pork thick soup" came from Sandiaoling and decided to settle down in Ruifang. Utilizing his culinary skills garnered from a stint in a big city hotel, he saw the potential of pork thick soup in the Ruifang market.
Add: Minsheng St., , , Ruifang Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Liao Mucheng Century-Old Shop One-Bite Cake
Description: Recommended ProductsDifferent flavors of one-bite cakes and spring field pizza (available in winter only)The one-bite cake has different names in Chinese, including cake dumpling, dragon cake, or mille feuille (one thousand layers). It is a kind of moon cake-like Taiwanese cake with either sweet or salty stuffing.
Add: No.129, Jishan St., Rueifang Dist.,  22448, Taiwan, Ruifang Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Fuchang Shop(Tea Leaf pork meatball Soup)
Description: Another Pinglin specialty is tea leaf pork meatball soup. First, the tea leaves used areis selected and grounded into a fine powder, then it is added to top quality minced pork. Aficionados say the two ingredients make a perfect pair. The finished tea leaf pork meatballs have a unique texture that is crispy and springy, and the taste is more refreshing and less oily than traditional pork...
Add: No.18, Pinglin St., , , Pinglin Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Mountain Legends
Description: Culinary art knows no boundaries. It is an ulimate enjoyment to savor delicious dishes in the natural environment of Shenkeng. Steaks, BBQ, buﬀets or outdoor karaoke and party food are all the delicacies to please the eyes and mouths.
Add: No.51, Fengge St., ,  222, Taiwan, Shenkeng Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C
Opentime: Tue. ~ Fri. 12:00 - 20:00 / Weekend 12:00 - 20:00 / The shop is closed on Monday.

Name: Jinshan Chongyu Restaurant
Description: The first rolled pastry and meat pastry shop on Jinshan Street, this restaurant offers juicy pork and beef pastries, a delicacy widely acclaimed by those who have tasted it. The specially made salted chicken, pickled cabbage, and ferns are all very tasty as well.
Add: No.203, Zhongshcn Rd., ,  208, Taiwan, Jinshan Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Yingge Xiangxiang Dumpling Shop
Description: The big, delicious handmade dumplings here are ﬁlled with fresh leeks and pork.：
Add: No.37 Nanya Rd., ,  239 Taiwan, Yingge Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: She's Green Mussel
Description: The store has a history of 20 years. Green Mussel and various seashell food and other dishes are served for your choice.Green Mussel and friend beef with onion are specially recommeded.
Add: No.22, Duchuantou St., ,  249, Taiwan, Bali Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Juisanfuli Restaurant
Description: Recommended ProductsSesame Chicken, Steamed Silky Fowl, Fujian Shark’s Fin Soup (Buddha Jumps Over the Wall), and Winter Melon Soup with ScallopAs to what the restaurant's name suggests, it was the employee's restaurant of Juisan Mining. During the Japanese colonial period, it was called Juisan Dining Hall. After the restoration of Taiwanese rule, it was renamed as Juisanfuli Restaurant.
Add: No. 45 Houtong Road, Houtong Borough, Ruifang District, , Ruifang Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C
Opentime: 11:30 - 19:00 (Please make a reservation by phone,before who want to dine in the evening.)

Name: Baoan Medicine
Description: Three Generations of Herbal MedicineWalking  along  Tamsui Old Street, there is a shop filled with herbal medicine and  Buddhist  statues.  This  is the  100-year-old  Baoan  Medicine shop,which has been run for three generations. It is known as being the oldest medicine shop in Tamsui and Bali. They use decent materials to make health drinks.
Add: 89 Zhongzheng Road, Tamsui District, , Tamsui Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: New Harbor Sea Food
Description: Over 40 years old, New Harbor Sea Food is one of the oldest restaurants in AoDi. Constantly introducing new dishes, the restaurant is highly popular. Sweet-and-sour eels and stirred-fried abalones are both signature dishes.
Add: No.60, Xingang St., ,  228, Taiwan, Gongliao Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Red Vermicelli
Description: Handmade, colorful darker shade noodles are heated then carefully boiled so they remain firm, and simmered, braised chitterling is added that leaves people coming back for more.
Add: No. 22-5, Section 1, Baoan Street, Shulin District, , Shulin Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Shifang Tea Cuisine
Description: The owner uses the zen-style of Japan’s Kaiseki cuisine in the dishes oﬀered in the store. There are over a hundred dishes that change with the seasons for the tourists to choose from.
Add: No. 92, Shuiliujiao Rd., ,  232, Taiwan, Pinglin Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Tofu & Old Mansion
Description: There are many posters of old Taiwanese movies and newspaper clips on the wall. This nostalgic restaurant oﬀers a clean and bright environment. The signature dishes are Beef & Sinky Tofu, Spicy Duck Blood Tofu Soup and braised bamboo shoots cooked with chicken broth and pork.
Add: No.140, Shenkeng St., ,  222, Taiwan, Shenkeng Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Fu Gu Beef Noodles
Description: If the number of customers in a shop is an indication of the shop's popularity, then any shop that has customers "anytime" or "always" must be considered a good shop. Right around the corner in front of Rui Fang Train Station, there stands a three-window storefront. The store is always teeming with customers slurping the store's famous beef noodles.
Add: No.21, Minsheng St., , , Ruifang Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Gao's Fried Fresh Squid
Description: A full bowl of fried fresh squid contains only two simple food ingredients, cabbage and squid; the aromatic fried cabbage has a crunchy texture and tastes sweet as well as the well-processed squid is crusty and chewy. Mixed with 4 seasonings, sour, sweet, salty, and spicy, the simple bowl of squid becomes very special.
Add: No.28, Gongkou Street, , , Banqiao Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C
Opentime: Tuesday ~ Sunday 8:00-17:30. The shop is closed on Mondays and the Chinese New Year holidays from the prior day before the Chinese New Year's Eve to the 5th day of the 1st lunar month.

Name: Fumei Croissant Bakery
Description: The bona fide gift item to bring back from a trip to Sanxia is dozen or so Croissant (literally in Mandarin "bull horns"). Tucked away in a lonely little alcove of Sanxia Market is Fumei Croissant Bakery-the ﬁrst shop to create the recipe for "golden croissants". They have a tender middle and a crispy exterior and taste buttery and by that virtue sell so well.
Add: No. 25 Sinyi Street, Sanxia Town, Taipei County, Sanxia Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C
Opentime: 08:00 - 18:00 / The shop is closed on Monday.(Closed on New Year's Eve to the fourth day、Moon Festival、Dragon Boat Festival,and Tomb Sweeping Day.)

Name: Yaomei Agricultural Product Shop
Description: Recommended ProductsAlishan High-Mountain Tea, Handmade NougatA few steps from the intersection of Shuqi Road and Jishan Street, there is a log signboard reading (Yao Mei A Li Shan Wu Long Cha), Jiufen Yaomei Agricultural Product Shop. When turning to the other side of the signborad, a small aluminum doorplate from grandpa's time is spotted.
Add: No.146, Jishan St., ,  224, Taiwan, Ruifang Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Wu Mama Handmade Dumplings
Description: When you visit Taishan you can find many inexpensive snacks. Although most are common, their preparation requires meticulous care. One well-known stand that serves fresh dumplings fitting this description is located on the second floor of the Taishan Public Market. The dumplings are highly praised, and customers often buy many boxes at a time.
Add: Floor 2, No. 212, Chuanxing Road, Taishan District, , Taishan Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Jiufen Food Quiz Shop
Description: Recommended Productsfirst stinky tofu shop in Jiufen, bamboo rice, Taiwanese proverbsJiufen Food Quiz Shop was the first stinky tofu shop ever in Jiufen. Dozens of Taiwanese proverbs are posted on the walls as a way for customers to learn more about traditional Taiwanese wisdom.
Add: No. 106, Jishan St., ,  224, Taiwan, Ruifang Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Pizza Olmo
Description: The secret to wood-smoked pizza is the kiln built by the owner himself, with longan wood as fuel. The fruit scent add to the taste and crunchiness of pizza.
Add: No.46, Zhibo Rd., ,  252, Taiwan, Sanzhi Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C
Opentime: Thu. -Mon.：11:30~19:30 Weekend 11:30-21:00  closed on Tue & Wed.

Name: Lee Noodles
Description: Take a left turn after you head out of Lane 410 and you'll see Lee Noodles about 50 m down the road. They are known for the way they cut the noodles. As they busily prepare the meals, you can see how the division of labor works. Some prepare ingredients, some cut them and some stir fry them.
Add: No. 404 Jinsin Street, Zhonghe  Dis t.,  New Taipei  City, Zhonghe Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: A-Po Sashimi
Description: A-Po Sashimi is a representative of the finest seafood available in Yingge. The place is always packed causing trafﬁc jams in Zhongjheng First Road. There is not a lot of variety on the menu with items such as Taiwanese style sashimi rolls that go well with a bowl of fresh miso soup. If that is not enough to eat, you can add some snack plates and refreshing chilled noodles.
Add: No. 63 Zhongjheng First Road, Yingge Town, Taipei County, Yingge Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Ching Ching Restaurant
Description: Chef’s Specials: Shrimp Cake, Tomato Soup in Pork Rib Broth
Add: No.6, Sec. 3, Zhongyang Rd., , , Tucheng Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C
Opentime: 11:00-22:00 (Closed on the first day of the lunar year )

Name: Shiding Lindera Sausages
Description: “Lindera” is a kind of wild pepper spice. Hind leg meat of black pigs is used for a  ﬁrm taste, and the light lemon scent has a bit of lemongrass and ginger.
Add: No.6, Xiahengping, ,  223, Taiwan, Shiding Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C
Opentime: Mon. - Fri. 11:00 - 17:30 / Weekend 09:00 - 17:30 / Close on Wed.

Name: Old Friends Sweet Taro Ball
Description: Recommended Productshandmade sweet taro ball, ginger tea sweet taro ball, mountain yam sweet taro ball, green tea sweet taro ballThere is a prominent yellow signboard which reads "Old Friends Sweet Taro Balls" not far from the entrance of Jishan Old Street (Jiudaoko), approximately 20 meters to the right.The Old Friends Sweet Taro Ball was founded in 1990.
Add: No. 4-3, Jishan St., , , Ruifang Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: De-li Service Station(Soy-Stewed Pork Knuckles)
Description: Pinglin is a popular destination for cyclists and walkers because it offers a great environment for outdoor activities. When people are done with these exercises, they need good tasting food that can replenish their lost energy and fill their appetite. At moments like these, Soy-Stewed Pork Knuckle is a dish that cannot be missed.
Add: No.140, Shuiliujiao Road, , , Pinglin Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: “Healthful＂ crisp roll
Description: The owner of this shop tasted the custard crisp roll by accident when he was abroad. Since then he couldn't forget the taste. Then he began to do some research and invented the delicious “Healthful” crisp roll. There are six ﬂavors; people just couldn't help eaing one by one because it is so delicious.
Add: No.19, Touqian Rd., ,  242, Taiwan, Xinzhuang Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Camellia Village herbal ice cream
Description: Four ﬂavors of herbal ice cream are provided for the customers to choose from: ginger  ﬂower, lavender, sunﬂower and rosemary.
Add: No.67, Meizhuxi, ,  227, Taiwan, Shuangxi Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Xiaode Zhang Niuweng Mutton stove
Description: Chip mutton into small pieces, add red date, medlar and other 28 Chinese herbs, and stew with charcoal fire for more than 2 hours. The soup is sweet and nutritious; the mutton is tender and inexhaustible after taste.
Add: No.89, Sec. 1, Zhongshan Rd., ,  234, Taiwan, Yonghe Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Original Flavor Sesame Chicken
Description: If you were to compare all the fine snack foods of Sanchong, no doubtthe sesame oil chicken would be on the top of the list. Original Flavor Sesame Chicken are prepared every afternoon, but it isn’t merely the freshness that wins favor, but also the price, which is more reasonable than similar shops.
Add: No. 56-3 Zhongyang North Road, Sanchong District, Taipei County, Sanchong Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Taishan Li’s pepper pie shop
Description: The shop is very small with only 6-7 square meters. The two big jars for baking the pepper pie are made by hand by the boss himself with volcanic earth. The pepper pie has a taste of crisp, but is not greasy with very thin skin and big meat stuffing. The stuffing is made of pig’s fresh rear leg meat plus green onion, pepper and fragrance made by private secrete formula.
Add: No.216, Sec. 2, Tailin Rd., ,  243, Taiwan, Taishan Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Jinshan Temple Gate Ice City
Description: The owner has worked very hard to develop new products. He is concerned about the selection of ingredients and believes in the business principle of making and selling fresh items. There are dozens of ice dishes, among which the "fluffy ice" is most loved by customers.
Add: No.94, jinbauli St., ,  208,Taiwan, Jinshan Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Yongbo Garbage Noodles
Description: One of the most unusual places to eat in Yingge is at an inexpensive restaurant well-known among locals, Yongbo Garbage Noodles. The strange name of these noodles comes from the turbid nature of the soup base, which is made by simmering pork bone and then adding a special spicy oil.
Add: No. 157, Zhongzheng First Road, Yingge District, , Yingge Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Sanzhi Happy Pig Bakery
Description: In the bakery are many pig decoraions, even the exterior of the counter hasconcrete pig botoms. The bakery uses imported cream, cheese, buter, and ﬂourto make breads and cakes with a true sense of happiness.
Add: No.27, Puwei, ,  252, Taiwan, Sanzhi Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C
Opentime: Apr. - Sep. 11:00~19:00； Oct.- Mar. 11:00~18:00 closed on Mon.

Name: Chen’s Tofu Dessert
Description: The tofu desserts here use Wang’s Tofu as the main ingredient, which include products such as tofu ice cream, tofu cake, tofu cheese, and tofu pudding. Various fragrant and delicious tofu desserts can be found here.：
Add: Mon. ~ Fri. 10:00-17:00 /Weekend 09:30-18:30, Shiding Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Tea Country Garden
Description: This place offers many kinds of tea snacks, and this is also Pinglin’s biggest tea snack shop that produces items such as tea egg rolls, teacakes, square tea biscuits, tea cakes, and tea candies.Tea Leaf Egg RollsCooking in Pinglin often involves infusing traditional dishes with local tea, which makes the food particularly popular among tourists who want to try something new.
Add: No. 90, Shuiliujiao Rd., ,  232, Taiwan, Pinglin Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Tofu Ice Cream
Description: Dexing Residence is the inventor of tofu ice cream. With a slight touch of scorching aroma, tofu ice cream is creamy and smooth. It comes with a variety of ﬂavors, while tofu, caramel and sesame are more popular. The comic books and postcards drawn by Teacher Yen Song-Tao are also available for sale.
Add: No.48, Shenkeng St., ,  222, Taiwan, Shenkeng Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Shunyi Tea House
Description: Famous for the specially made tea dishes. Their tea oil noodle has a light teafragrance that spreads in your mouth.
Add: No. 216, Sec. 8, Beiyi Rd., ,  232, Taiwan , Pinglin Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Jiufen Zheng’s Traditional Fishballs
Description: Recommended Productstraditional fishball, cuttlefish ball, Fuzhou ball, braised pork rice, specialty dry noodlesZheng's Traditional Fishballs is located in the first half of Jishan Old Street, and has been established for more than a decade. The name of this restaurant demonstrates its confidence in their brand and quality.
Add: No.25, Jishan St., Rueifang Dist.,  22448, Taiwan, Ruifang Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Mountain and Sea View Teahouse
Description: Recommended Productsscenic view, beverages, tea ceremony, set mealsThe Mountain and Sea View Teahouse resides in a yellow tiled three-story building near the rear of Jishan St. As the location happens to be where the Old Street takes a turn, with the Rear Viewing Platform, this teahouse has a better, non-obscured view than most.
Add: No. 150, Jishan St., ,  224, Taiwan, Ruifang Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Xiong's baked roll and twisted cruller
Description: This shop is run by 3 generations in the past 75 years. The baked roll and twisted cruller have accompanied many people as they grow up. Thebaked roll, twisted cruller, bread twist and "twins" are most populaand attract a lot of customers.
Add: No.206, Xinzhuang Rd., ,  242, Taiwan, Xinzhuang Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Miners Café & Restaurant
Description: Recommended Productsgold, miner’s boxed lunchDuring the Japanese occupation period, Jinguashi was a mining area under the management of a Japanese company, Kamaishi Mining and Iron Works.
Add: No.8-1, Jinguang Rd., ,  224, Taiwan, Ruifang Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Hengxi Q Meatballs
Description: Sanxia is a town with a main street feel. As you leave the Sanxia Old Street area where most tourists gather, surrounding it are still many food stalls and eateries waiting for visitors to come have a taste. One of the best is Hengxi Q Meatballs, located on Minsheng Street. Its namesake dish features an outer skin that is chewy while its lean-meat filling has a stark aroma.
Add: No. 193 Minsheng Street; Sanxia District, , Sanxia Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Fu-Guei-Tao-Yuan Art & Culture
Description: Just like the exhibition hall attached to it, the Fu-Guei restaurant uses valuable artistic pieces by well-known artists for its decorations and serving implements. When eating hot pot served with a dining set that costs over ten thousand Taiwan dollars, the beer- marinated chicken seems even more intoxicating.
Add: No. 96, Chongqing Street, Yingge District, , Yingge Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C
Opentime: 11:30 ~ 20:00 closed on the first and the third Tue. of the month

Name: Old Place
Description: Old Place is a very popular restaurant for street-food-type dishes in Sanzhi. The dumplings contain whole shrimp. The shrimp tastes fresh, and the broth is thick. Steamed meat balls from Chaozhou are soft, chewy, but not greasy, with lots of meat inside.
Add: No.21, Sec. 2, Danjin Rd., ,  252, Taiwan, Sanzhi Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Big White Sand
Description: This restaurant provides Chinese stir-fry dishes and Western dishes. They also provide a very popular homemade taro dessert. The restaurant offers ice cream in the summer, and this wonderful gesture helps to cool the tourists.
Add: No.33-6, Xiayuankeng, ,  253, Taiwan, Shimen Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Lin Yi-He Hall healthy preserved fruit
Description: Chinese medicine is used to make all kinds of tasty healthy preserved fruits, such as olives and eight celestial fruit.
Add: No.3, Chang’an St., ,  227, Taiwan, Shuangxi Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Shuangxi Delicious Refreshment Room
Description: The most well-known bento (lunch box) store in Shuangxi. The smoked pig scalp is highly recommended. According to customers’ preferences, the dish can be prepared differently.
Add: ,  227, Taiwan, Shuangxi Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C
Opentime: 09:00-19:30 Closed on Fri. (Closed from Chinese New Year’s Eve to the fourth day of the lunar year )

Name: Hall of dragon and phoenix pie shop
Description: Reputed for more than 50 years, the Restaurant has kept sincerity and trust as its operation concepts and followed traditional pie-making process. Its main products are various exquisite pies such as engagement pie, celebration cake and birthday turtle cake, etc. Little Deng pie and Lijun pie, the double glory of Luzhou, are its famous products and have met with great favor.
Add: No.49, Zhongzheng Rd., ,  247, Taiwan, Luzhou Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Sisters fritter
Description: The old store has a history of more than 30 years. Besides milk fritter,milk donut, Chinese steamed buns stuffed with pickled vegetable and taro pieetc. are also served. The fritters have crisp skin on the outside and tastes sift and chewing on the inside.
Add: No. 25,Duchuantou St., ,  249, Taiwan, Bali Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Ah Lan Herbal Glutinous Rice Cake
Description: When tourists visit Jiufen, not only do they want to try the taro balls, they will definitely want to queue up for Ah Lan's herbal glutinous rice cakes! These cakes are another type of delicious food item representative of Jiufen!
Add: No.90, Jishan St., , , Ruifang Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Jiufen Teahouse
Description: Recommended Productstea, ceramics, painting, historical site, five tael cake, scenic viewThe owner of the Jiufen Teahouse, Zhi-Sheng Hong, came to Jiufen in the 1980s and purchased this old house in 1987. He has preserved most of the original structure, save for one major adjustment: the creation of an open inner courtyard for more natural lighting.
Add: No. 142, Jishan St., ,  224, Taiwan, Ruifang Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Shanquanshui Handmade Bean Curd Tofu Pudding
Description: After a trip to the busy market on Sanxia’s Minsheng Street, nothing satisfies the thirsty and weary soul more than a bowl of handmade bean curd made from natural mountain spring water. At the Shanquanshui restaurant desser shop, the bean curd tofu pudding is meticulously prepared to give off a slight aroma that is revealed in the first bite and becomes stronger as one begins to savor th...
Add: No.149 Minsheng St., Sanxia  Dist.,  237, Taiwan, Sanxia Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C
Opentime: 09:00-22:00 closed on the first and the forth Tue. of the month

Name: Jiayi Honey Tea Goose
Description: There are many ways to cook goose, with each having its own enthusiasts. One of the more unique styles is Taishan’s honey tea goose. This stand carefully selects mature geese that weigh between 5 to 6 kilograms. After cooking the chef spreads on honey and homemade sauce, letting the flavors penetrate the meat before smoke-roasting the bird.
Add: Floor 2, No. 212, Chuanxing Road, Taishan District, , Taishan Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Youngdoor Cafe
Description: Can Northern Taiwan look like Greece? Along Provincial Highway No. 2, there is a very Greek-style small restaurant in blue and white with an ocean view called “Youngdoor  Café”. The layout of the cozy interior furnishing makes it comfortable to enjoy the scenic view. Many visitors choose this place to have afternoon tea, or a cup of coffee with some cake or waffles.
Add: 29-1 Zhongyi Road, Jinshan District, , Jinshan Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Yen Yi Te Xing
Description: Special Recommendation: Tofu Ice Cream
Add: No.48, Shenkeng St.,  Shenkeng  Dist.,  New, Shenkeng Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Smoked Restaurant
Description: Taste the pride of Bavaria in Taiwan! Many traditional German dishes are provided here, such as smoked pig’s feet, sausages, smoked poultry, cheese from the Alps, and world-famous HB Beer.
Add: No.27, Sec. 1, Zhongxing St., ,  252, Taiwan, Sanzhi Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Nanshihjiao Taiwan Chilled Doufu
Description: There is a stand that sells chilled doufu (bean curd) half-way in the night market. The purveyor is good with people and her shop selling the sweet desert has been open for many years. All the usual toppingshave been boiled and are ready to eat, but the most commonly ordered treats are peanut and mung bean.
Add: Alley 20, Lane 418, Jingxin Street, Zhonghe City, Taipei County, Zhonghe Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Wugu old customer meat bals and oyster noodles
Description: Although the shop only sells noodles and meat balls, the boss, nevertheless, pays very much attention to the quality of his products. He makes a set quantity of meat balls everyday, and the sausages are made and sold out the same day. Since the materials are fresh without adding any chemicals and colors, the food is by no means harmful to your health.
Add: No.120, Sec. 1, Minyi Rd., ,  248, Taiwan, Wugu Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Five Stars pettitoes rice
Description: For more than 30 years, the restaurant has been known for its specialty, gravy pettitoes, made by inherited secrete formula. The cooking method pays special attention to whether the greasy and fishy smell is removed, and whether the gravy flavor has deeply penetrated into meat.
Add: No.119, Sec. 1, Ziqiang Rd., ,  241, Taiwan, Sanchong Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Master Liang's beef noodle and dumpling
Description: The soup of the famous beef noodle is made by beef cooked for a long time, and it also contains the gravy beef shank and hand made noodles, which makes it very chewy and delicious.
Add: No.572, Sec2, Zhongshan Rd., , New Taipei, Bali Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Badasang aboriginal restaurant
Description: Badasnag means face tottoo in the language of Taroko Tribe. The exterior of the building is make by natural materials and the food offered in the restaurant is mainly cooked in the aboriginal people's style, a good place to taste new flavours.
Add: No.111, Guanhai Blvd., Bail Dist.,  249, Taiwan, Bali Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Bitou A-zhu Seafood Old Restaurant
Description: When driving towards Fulong or Yilan along the Coastal Highway, visors will see a huge signboard reading "Bitou A-zhu Seafood Old Restaurant" before entering the Bitou Cape Tunnel. This restaurant founded in 1986 is very famous among connoisseurs.
Add: No. 115 Bitou Road, Ruifang District, , Ruifang Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Hot Oil Mochi
Description: 40 years ago, Grandpa Mochi was not as old as now, so everyone in Rui Fang called him "Uncle Mochi". It was then that Uncle Mochi started his little hot oil mochi store, painstakingly selling the same dish. His mochi warmed the stomachs of many Rui Fang people; they also warmed many Rui Fang people's memories.
Add: ,  (No. 44 Store in Food Street), Ruifang Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Lanxiang House
Description: Recommended ProductsWild Red-Core Native Guava, Golden Date, Red Cypress Essential OilPassing by Shanhaiguan Café, a magnificent view come into sight. While enjoying the wide and open scenery of Jiufen, visitors can smell a strong fruit fragrance.
Add: No. 173 Jishan Street, Ruifang District, , Ruifang Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Taro Potato Teahouse
Description: Shopping DirectoryPayment Options： Cash,  Credit Card,  Other Information : Will accept foreign currencyRecommended Productsmeal, tea ceremony, dishes for sharing, Jiufen mountain view, antiques, wooden craftsThe Taro Potato Teahouse is located diagonally across from the Jiufen Business District Tourist Information Center on Shuqi Road.
Add: No.18, Shihsia Ln., Rueifang Dist.,  22448, Taiwan, Ruifang Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Linyuan Jumbo Meatballs
Description: Quail’s Eegg, mushroom, and shredder bamboo shoots are mixed with top quality pork and then stuffed into a chewy, handmade wrapping. The finished meatball is topped off with a garlic sauce, completing this wonderful dish.
Add: No. 104, Fuzhong Road, Banqiao District, , Banqiao Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Changying Meatballs
Description: Traditional Changhua meatballs are also available in Yingge! Hearty meat that borders on addicting is crammed into a chewy, springy dumpling wrapping, resulting in a meatball that is so filling, only one bowl is enough to satisfy your appetite. An important part of good meatballs is the sauce, and at this restaurant a homemade version combined with a small scoop of crushed garlic hits th...
Add: No. 35, Xingzheng Road, Yingge District, , Yingge Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: BestBrews
Description: Meet up with friends or colleagues in the Bar for a refreshing beer from our international Best Brews™ collection.
Add: 1st Floor, No. 1 Section, Wenhua 3rd Road, Linkou District, , Linkou Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: HASEGAWA CO.LTD
Description: Leader’s Brown Sugar bubble Tea is a gift box of Brown Sugar Pearl Milk Tea recommended by the most bloggers in 2020.Strictly selected several high-quality Assam black teas, paired with mochi tapioca .100% use Taiwan brown sugar, presenting a rich brown sugar aroma.Perfectly reproduce the deliciousness of Taiwanese hand-rolled bubble tea.Let you easily enjoy the fun of brown sugar pearl ...
Add: 10F.-5, No. 14, Ln. 609, Sec. 5, Chongyang Rd., , , Sanchong Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C
Opentime: See the official website or call the administrator for details.

Name: Sancai Lingzhi Mushroom Emperor Cuisine
Description: The broth is cooked for two days with precious deer horn , lingzhi mushrooms as well as 30 unique Chinese herbs. It is consumed with delicacies from the mountain, a meal suitable for all seasons.
Add: No.52-1, Shibachong Xi, ,  223, Taiwan (R.O.C.), Shiding Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Xiangmao Candy Factory
Description: Pinglin’s only tea candy factory. Of the six or seven kinds already developed, Qingru tea candy is the most well-known. The reputation of tea nougat is also quite good, as it contains a rich and fragrant taste.
Add: No.91, Shuiliujiao Rd., ,  232, Taiwan, Pinglin Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Su Yi Xing restaurant
Description: Deep fried pork and bean sheet shrimp rolls are the most popular dishes. The store owner used to be a singer; thus, sometimes customersmay enjoy music performance while savoring the Shuangxi delicacies.
Add: No.77, Zhonghua Rd., ,  227, Taiwan, Shuangxi Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Jinshan Brothers Restaurant
Description: Brothers Restaurant, which is located next to Tzuhu Temple, is run by the three Kuo Brothers who use their outstanding cooking talent to make wonderful dishes. The pan-fried ribs which tastes crispy on the outside and soft on the isnide are the most popular dish.
Add: No.2, Jinbauli St., ,  208, Taiwan, Jinshan Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: The Dlcservice Cafe
Description: Located close to the Jing'an MRT Station, the "Dlcservice cafe," which has a country-style decoration at the gate. Once you open the wooden door, the interior decoration gives people a very relaxing feel. There're small objects hanging on the walls, such as postcards and leather accessories. Exactly, it sells Japanese groceries. The decoration setting and the menu are usually changed eve...
Add: No.6, Ln. 167, Jing'an Road, , , Zhonghe Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C
Opentime: 12:00 - 21:00 / Weekend 11:00 - 21:00 / The shop is closed on Monday.

Name: Teng Feng Fishball Museum
Description: Lets Learn about All Sorts of FishballsTo help people understand the history of Tamsui fishballs, the Teng Feng Fishball Museum was erected. It is the first Fishball Museum in Taiwan. Although it is not very big, the museum shows in  detail  the  manufacturing process of fishballs. What kind of fish is suitable to make fishballs? What are the representative fishballs of every area?
Add: 117 Zhongzheng Road, Tamsui District, , Tamsui Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Yingge Crock Pot
Description: Noodles in a crock pot ﬁrst appeared on Jianshanpu Road and they have since moved to the second ﬂoor food court in Pottery Building (Taoguan) on Chongcing Road. This is as close to a local delicacy as you can ﬁnd in Yingge and it is the perfect treat after exploring the shops on ﬁrst ﬂoor.
Add: No. 95 Chongcing Road, Yingge Township, Yingge Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Laoshu Restaurant
Description: The highly recommended restaurant by "netizens" does not have a menu. Customers order their food from suggestions given by the owner. Popular dishes include fish head  casserole, fried pork and rock shrimp. Visitors are advised to go to the restaurant in a group because it is easier to order different dishes, which are served in very generous portions.
Add: 12, Lane 290, Section 3, Xinwu Road, Wulai District, , Xindian Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Xindian-style Cuisine
Description: Guangming Eat Street is located near Bitan. Up and down the road are snack shops. Half-way on the street is a shop that sells oily rice that just about every Xindian citizen recognizes as tasty. The flavorful Guangming brand-name sticky rice is slathered in oil and topped with dried fluffy pork and stirred with a sweet sauce.
Add: 125 Guangming Street Xindian District, Taipei Coun, Xindian Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Banqiao Shitou Meatball
Description: The skin is fried and the meatball has rich inner stuffing: stir-fried pork and bamboo, peanut powder, salad sauce, chili paste and juice made by the owner. Satisfying your stomach!
Add: No.11, Ln. 410, Sec. 2, Wenhua Rd., ,  220, Taiwan, Banqiao Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: World Soy Milk King
Description: Yonghe-made soy milk is known throughout the isles of Taiwan, with World Soy Milk King has the leading business plan and the mostfame.World Soy Milk King is open 24 hours a day, offering Chinese-style breakfast throughout Taiwan with a twist.
Add: No. 284 Yonghe Road Section 2, Yonghe City, Taipei County, Yonghe Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Gaosyong (Kaohsiung) Black Wagon Wheels
Description: Black Wagon Wheels refers to a type of Taiwanese snack stand that carries a variety of steamed, boiled and grilled vegetables and meats. Among them are stuffed cabbage, black wagon wheels, and other kinds of boiled tempura-like vegetables just waiting there to tease the hunger of every customer to buy. The broth is made from shaved ﬁsh and large pieces of a large white carrot-like radish...
Add: No.16, Jhongsing St., ,  23445, Taiwan, Yonghe Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C
Opentime: 18:00-00:00(AM) (Closed from Chinese New Year’s Eve to the fourth day of the lunar year Closed on rainday

Name: Anna Cafe
Description: The owner’s delicate handiwork is seen in the mulicolored windmills that spin with the wind. These handiworks sooth one’s heart. Coﬀee and scenery is a great combinaion.
Add: No.1-17, Zhongyang Rd., ,  253, Taiwan, Shimen Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Mountaintop Shop of Salted Fried Pig’s Feet
Description: The ingredient of this dish is taken from Shiding’s black pig’s feet, the texture of which is tender and full of collagen. It is first brewed with soybean sauce, and then steamed to maintain the original juices o the meat. After that, it is fried to give the skin its crispy and yet not greasy taste.
Add: No.25, Fanzikeng, ,  223, Taiwan, Shiding Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Under the Old Tree
Description: Located at the entrance of the Old Street, it is one of the oldest tofu restaurants here. A table full of tofu dishes is very aﬀordable and gives a sense of happiness. Sinky Tofu with Pig Intesines and Duck Blood Cakes is the signature dish. It is stewed with a dozen of Chinese herbs for over two hours.
Add: No.163, Shenkeng St., ,  222, Taiwan, Shenkeng Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Lin's mushroom meat sauce
Description: The sauce is made of pig's fresh hindquarter meat. The meat is pickled, wrapped with a layer of sweet potato starch, and then put into pot to boil. So the gravy is fresh and the meat is tender.
Add: No.344, Xinzhuang Rd., ,  242, Taiwan, Xinzhuang Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Linkou Power Plant popsicles
Description: The traditional popsicles are sold in Linkou Power Plant with many different flavors, such as rice cake, red bean, taro, Luoshen flower and milk, etc. There is a variety of flavors for choice, all cool to the heart. Many people come from very far places for group purchase. A box contains 60 ice-suckers, but you had better prepare an ice box for the sake of environmental protection.
Add: No.139, Xiafu, ,  244, Taiwan, Linkou Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Jinshan Kuo's Almond Cookies Shop
Description: Completely handmade, this cookie shop provides pan-fried peanuts, almonds, sesame, pumpkin candy, coriander rolls, and nougat candy, all of which are all fresh without preservatives.
Add: No. 77, jinbauli St., ,  208, Taiwan, Jinshan Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Amei Teahouse
Description: The Amei Teahouse is located on Shuqi Road. Its strong Japanese architectural style makes it very eye-catching. In particular, when it is rumored that the teahouse looks like the building of Yubaba in the animated picture Spirited Away of Hayao Miyazak, more and more people want to find out the truth about it.
Add: No. 20, Shixa Lane, Ruifang District, , Ruifang Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Jiufen Jinzhi Hongzao Rouyuan
Description: Recommended Productsred vinasse rouyuan, vegetarian red vinasse rouyuanOne of the most famous snacks in Jiufen is red vinasse rouyuan. This is a rouyuan containing chunks of meat marinated and fermented with red vinasse. Jiufen Jinzhi Hongzao Rouyuan is an important reason why red vinasse rouyuan has become so well-known in the Jiufen region.
Add: No. 112 (with meat), No. 63 (vegetarian), Jishan St., , , Ruifang Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Jiufen Old Noodle Restaurant
Description: Recommended Productsbeef noodles, wonton noodles, peanut ice creamThe Jiufen Old Noodle Restaurant was established in 1958 Currently, Mr. Shi is the second generation owner. Although it was not the first noodle restaurant ever in the Jiufen region, it was the first to ever serve beef noodles.
Add: No. 45, Jishan St., , , Ruifang Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Rice with Turkey
Description: Huixiang Chiayi Rice with Turkey is different from the shredded turkey rice one usually sees at street stalls because this restaurant cuts the meat into larger chunks to make it more firm and chewy. Homemade sauce is added for an authentic southern taste.
Add: No. 264, Section 2, Zhongyang Road, Tucheng District, , Tucheng Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C
Opentime: 11:00-20:30(Closed on Sat. Closed from Chinese New Year’s Eve to the fifth day of the lunar year)

Name: Liu Biju Chaozhou Casserole Porridge
Description: There're many different methods to cook porridge; Guangdong porridge and Taiwanese salty congee are the common cuisines for general customers. In recent years, the casserole porridge becomes popular in Banqiao due to the use of Taitung Guanshan Emperor Rice as the main ingredient; particularly, not until the guests make an order, the rice won't be put into the casserole. The rice is cook...
Add: No. 3, Mingquan Rd., , , Banqiao Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Minghong Clam Consommé
Description: Minghong Clam Consommé can be found at the corner of  Wun hua Road . Though a small shop selling only rice vermicelli and stewed pork sauce over rice, the eatery’s sizable sign with a big oyster picture on it  is  hard  to  miss.
Add: No.87-3, Wenhua N. Rd., ,  241, Taiwan (R.O.C.), Sanchong Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Granny’s Iron Eggs
Description: Dark Chewy Iron EggsWant to try some special iron eggs? Then you have to come to Tamsui for some of Granny’s iron eggs. Their creator, Granny Yang, ran a buffet and noodle shop. On one occasion she got too busy and over-marinated the eggs , and fortunately, customers could not get off enough. The eggs then became a hot selling item for the past 30 years.
Add: 135-1 Zhongzheng Road, Tamsui District, , Tamsui Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Granny’s Plum Juice
Description: When  it  gets  hot,  have  a  glass  of iced plum juice as it is the best way to quench your thirst. Granny's Plum Juice uses dried plums and they are marinated for three months. After  spice, perilla, rosella tea, and 17 other herbs are added, it is then brewed in a clay pot over a small fire and finally turns into a sweet and sour drink.
Add: 135-2 Zhongzheng Road, Tamsui District, , Tamsui Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Yeh’s Wonton Restaurant
Description: Jay Chou’s Favorite WontonThere  is  a  restaurant  in Tamsui  that  offers  a vermicelli  dish  that  is famous throughout China and  Hong  Kong — the "Jay Chou Set". This is Yeh’s Wonton Restaurant, famous for the thin layer and rich fillings of wontons served with omelet strips, laver and other veggies. The soup is refreshing, and the set comes with a tender marinated fried drumstick.
Add: 177 Zhongzheng Road, Tamsui District, , Tamsui Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Yannick Patisserie
Description: Media reports made the desert shop extremely popular,  and  many people have come to the café next to its factory in Wanli for some freshly baked desserts. It's a top pick for an enjoyable afternoon tea while you are in Wanli.
Add: 127-5 Malian Road, Wanli District, , Wanli Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Haishan Bakery
Description: The Haishan Bakery is famous for its “Haishan Agar-Pudding Cake,” where the cake ingredients contain agar, flour and fresh eggs. The strong aromatic egg smell fills the small shop when the fresh cakes come out of the oven. The smooth texture will make one accidently eat the entire cake one bite after another. Persistent on adding no fragrances and seasonings, so that everybody loves it, ...
Add: N o. 2 , Zhonghua  Rd . , ,, Shuangxi Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Wang’s Tofu
Description: Special Recommendations: Tofu Pudding, Roasted Tofu
Add: No.85, Shiding E. St., , , Shiding Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C
Opentime: 10:00~17:00 / Weekend 07:30-18:00 (The shop is closed on Monday.)

Name: Yuelai Pavilion Restaurant
Description: Yuelai pavilion restaurant provides various kinds of Taiwanese dishes and seafood dishes. Crispy fried ribs and curry taro balls are popular house dishes in the store.
Add: No.56, Sec. 1, Zhongshan Rd., ,  252, Taiwan, Sanzhi Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Zengji Calamari Stew
Description: There are in particular two shops that sell Calamari Stew in Sanchong Night Market diagonally across the street Minghong Clam Consommé. The shop is larger thus easy to find. At the present address the owners have 30 years of experience selling the delicacy, along with rice vermicelli and stewed ground pork on rice.
Add: No 150 Wunhua North Road, Sanchong District, Taipei County, Sanchong Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Meichun Highway Hotel
Description: The hotel is next to the Pinglin gate. A simplistic restaurant without a setmenu, it oﬀers simple, family dishes. One can tell the owner the budget and preferred dishes, and she will make a whole table of delicious food.
Add: No.22, Sec. 8, Beiyi Rd., ,  232, Taiwan, Pinglin Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Lobster King
Description: Lobsters can be prepared in over a dozen ways, such as steam, with meso or wasabi, to give a few examples. Succulent abalones are also a delicacy not to be missed. Every dish can be customized in the store.
Add: No.186, Renhe Rd., ,  228, Taiwan, Gongliao Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Tianding Soup Noodles
Description: Tianding Qiezai Noodle Restaurant, located in Miaokou business circle of Luzhou, is operated by its boss, Liao Tianding. It has a history of more than 30 years, and is one of very famous restaurants here. It has a very tall and big red sign discernible from very far. The noodle here will never be cooked too sot, and the noodle soup is always clear, fresh and sweet.
Add: No.22, Desheng St., ,  247, Taiwan, Luzhou Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C
Opentime: Mon. ~ Fri. 8:00 - 23:00 / Weekend 07:00 - 23:00 / The shop is closed on Tuesday.(Closed on New Year's Eve to the sixth day.)

Name: Deep-sea squid
Description: The golden fried big squid is crispy and served with special sauces, mayonnaise and mustard, with a topping of dried bonito flakes. It tastes light and not greasy at all.
Add: No 26, Duchuantou St., ,  249, Taiwan, Bali Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C
Opentime: Mon. ~ Fri. 10:00 - 20:00 / Weekend 09:00 - 21:00 / The shop is closed on typhoon.

Name: Jinshan Changyi Pastries Shop
Description: Unlike the traditional tastes today, this shop provides a variety of Chinese sweets, curry meat pastries, sweetheart cakes, green bean moon cakes, black bean paste, and pineapple cakes for you to choose from.
Add: No.57, Jinbauli St. ,  208, Taiwan, Jinshan Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: European Country Café
Description: While this store's Chinese name conveys the atmosphere of a European residence in the countryside, the English name "Babka" is an honorific term for old ladies in Eastern Europe, who are often masters at making delicate desserts, cookies, and cakes.
Add: No. 177, Jishan St., ,  224, Taiwan, Ruifang Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C
Opentime: 09:00~18:00; Closed every fourth Monday of the month

Name: Gojinshan Peanut Brittle
Description: Peanuts were known to ancient people as the "fruit of longevity", which is a great indication of how rich they are in nutrients. In fact, peanuts contain more than just protein, fat, and carbohydrates. They also contain unsaturated fatty acids, amino acids, vitamin B1 and B2, beta carotene, niacin, and other nutrients.
Add: No.30, Jishan St., , , Ruifang Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Hua Ji Dragon Phoenix Spring Roll
Description: Recommended ProductsDragon Phoenix Spring Roll, Glutinous Rice SausageHave you been asked what is the most difficult thing when trying to preserve authentic flavors? Some people may say it is the pickiness of customers, some may say it will depend on the determination and dedication of the cook.
Add: Minsheng St. Entrance, , , Ruifang Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C
Opentime: 08:30 - 22:30 / The shop is closed on Wednesday.

Name: Hereditary A-Mang’s Sweet Taro Balls
Description: Not far from the entrance of Jishan Old Street (Jiudaokou) is a small signs which says "Hereditary A-Mang's Sweet Taro Balls". This tiny shop, which seats only about a dozen, played a major role in how the sweet taro ball came to be known as a renowned Jiufen snack.Hereditary A-Mang's Sweet Taro Balls is one of the three oldest sweet taro ball shops in Jiufen.
Add: No. 41-2, Jishan St., ,  224, Taiwan, Ruifang Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: A City of Sadness
Description: Recommended ProductsOld fashioned rice with pork fat, Taiwanese family style stir-fry, economical a la carte, Western set meal, coffeeThe film "A City of Sadness" promoted the beauty of Jiufen globally; hence for a long time, Jiufen and the City of Sadness were virtually synonymous.
Add: 2F, No.35, Shuqi Rd., , , Ruifang Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: LiYi Cake Store
Description: Recommended ProductsButter sun cake, pineapple cake, curry cake , taro cakePineapple cakes are one of the most renowned and representative snacks in Taiwan. Now only are they well-liked by all ages, in recent years they have become the top gift choice for those traveling abroad.
Add: No.18, Qiche Rd., , , Ruifang Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Shijiang Wenzhou Wontons
Description: Stalls and small restaurants serving many of Taiwan’s favorite snacks have converged around Sanxia Old Street, meaning you can find almost anything you desire, including beloved wontons. Shijiang Wenzhou Wontons is located on Wenhua Road and serves affordable wontons that are about half the size of a fist. Only top ingredients are used so when you bite in, you get a huge taste of meat.
Add: No. 58 Wenhua Road; Sanxia District, , Sanxia Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Kueishan Power Station Popsicles
Description: Kueishan Power Station Ice Pops is a popsicle store located in the water conservation area of the Feitsui Reservoir. Its popsicles attract many tourists who visit just for the sake of having this traditional treat. There are many flavors to try, including pineapple, peanut, milk, and red bean, and their low cost means you can keep coming back for more of this cool, refreshing snack.
Add: No. 37 Guishan Road, Xindian District, , Xindian Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Traditional Pork Chop and Rice
Description: Many great foods line Yingge Old Street, such as traditional tofu pudding. But if you are looking for something to fill you up at lunch, one of your best options is at a restaurant serving traditional pork chop and rice. Here the flour added when making the fried pork chop is the perfect amount, creating a crisp exterior to go with the tender meat inside.
Add: No.85, Yuying St., ,  239, Taiwan, Yingge Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Yingge Oyster Vermicelli
Description: Yingge is a place known for being humble, a characteristic reflected in its cuisine. Nearly everywhere you look you can find somewhere serving inexpensive, excellent meals, one example of which is a place simply called Yingge Oyster Vermicelli. When you order these noodles the first thing you notice is that the chef crams lots of ingredients into a small bowl.
Add: No. 91, Zhongzheng First Road, Yingge District, , Yingge Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: The Eatery
Description: Enjoy simple and delicious everyday comfort food at our all-day dining restaurant.  We serve up all the local specialty dishes, a range of popular international choices and a tempting dessert selection.
Add: 1st Floor, No. 1 Section, Wenhua 3rd Road, Linkou District, , Linkou Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C

Name: Ruifang Food Court
Description: Ruifang Food Court is situated across from Ruifang Train Station; located in a traffic hub, it is close to the historical Ruifang Old Street and is a major tourist attraction. The Food Court has been established for more than five decades and has been transformed from a traditional wet market to today’s renowned Food Court. If you are looking for the most authentic Ruifang street eats, y...
Add: No. 2, Lane, 35, Minsheng St., Ruifang District, , Ruifang Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C
Opentime: 06:00 - 23:00; Closed four days a year (disinfection days)

Name: Misty Cake
Description: Brand Story: Jinguashih in Ruifang was once a major gold mining town. At that time, impoverished miners would have sweet potatoes as the main food to satisfy their hunger. Over the years, the plain and pure flavor has slowly been forgotten by most people. As an effort to rediscover that authentic texture, Misty Cake is borrowing the old-time cooking method and using a puff pastry to wrap...
Add: No. 6-1, Sec. 1, Mingdeng Rd., Ruifang District, , Ruifang Dist., New Taipei City Taiwán, R.O.C
